name: databox-twitter-wordcloud
description: A simple Databox app that shows a word cloud of your Twitter timeline

scripts.release: docker build -t databox-twitter-wordcloud . && docker tag databox-twitter-wordcloud amar.io:5000/databox-twitter-wordcloud && docker push amar.io:5000/databox-twitter-wordcloud

author: Yousef Amar <yousef@amar.io> (http://yousefamar.com/)
